text: Pedro Vitor de Sousa Neto Silva (born 14 February 1998), commonly known as Pedro Vitor, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Tupi. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Tupi |2019 |Série D |2||0||1Appearances in the Campeonato Mineiro||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||0||0||3||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !2!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!3!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:São Paulo FC players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Tupi Football Club players
